title.rendered: “Israeli Defense Forces Strike Hezbollah Targets across Lebanon: A Comprehensive Report on IDF’s Latest Counter-Terrorism Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Terror cells, terror infrastructures, and military facilities; the IDF attacked targets of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in Lebanese territory.

A fighter jet attacked a short while ago a group of terrorists in Itaroun area in southern Lebanon.

In addition, fighter jets attacked during the last day terrorist infrastructures and military buildings that served the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the areas of El Hiem, Kafr Kana and Jebel Belat.

Furthermore, the IDF attacked with artillery to eliminate threats in the areas of El Jibain, Atta al-Shaab and Itaroun.

Following the alerts this morning in the north of the country, two firings were identified from Lebanese territory towards the Kiryat Shmona area, the IDF attacked the firing sources. Additionally, a short while ago a firing was identified from Lebanese territory towards the Mount Dov area, the IDF attacked the firing sources.
